jdbcService.sql: update node_audit set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), actor_id = case when :actorId is null then actor_id else :actorId end, action_id = case when :actionId is null then action_id else :actionId end, log = case when :log is null then log else :log end, error = case when :error is null then error else :error end, node_id = case when :nodeId is null then node_id else :nodeId end where id = :id
